question: The India-based Neutrino Observatory (INO) Project aims at building a world-class underground laboratory. The laboratory is proposed to be built at which of the following places?
explanation: The India-based Neutrino Observatory (INO) Project aims at building a world-class underground laboratory for high energy and nuclear physics research in Theni district, Tamil Nadu. The initial goal of INO is to study neutrinos. Neutrinos are fundamental particles belonging to the lepton family.
